interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: UV Light for Nails,LKE Curing Lamp for Gel Nail Polish 54W UV Led Light Gel Nail Starter Kit Nail Dryer Accessories Review Date: 2019/07/03 Store: LKE Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LKE', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Number of Light Sources': '2', 'Wattage': '54 watts', 'Control Method': 'App', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 8.7 x 5.08 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required.'} Review Text: I just wan't ya'll to know.. I have never given myself a gel polish manicure in my LIFE before yesterday. I had been wanting to for the longest time, but I wasn't 100% prepared to make the commitment to purchasing the light and the top coats and the bottom coats and the paint, etc, etc..

Well if you are on the fence, jump it!

First of all, the lamp works. You set your timer and once you do that, all you have to do is put your hand it and it starts automatically. Awesome! Like a real salon. I was able to do my hands in 45 minutes. It would have been even faster but I did a test run on my thumb before doing them all at once to make sure I didn't mess anything up.

Overall, I am SO happy to have this nail curing lamp! Review Title: Salon Perfect Nails! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

UV Light for Nails,LKE Curing Lamp for Gel Nail Polish 54W UV Led Light Gel Nail Starter Kit Nail Dryer Accessories LKE {'Brand': 'LKE', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Number of Light Sources': '2', 'Wattage': '54 watts', 'Control Method': 'App', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.45 x 8.7 x 5.08 inches; 2 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required.'} I just wan't ya'll to know.. I have never given myself a gel polish manicure in my LIFE before yesterday. I had been wanting to for the longest time, but I wasn't 100% prepared to make the commitment to purchasing the light and the top coats and the bottom coats and the paint, etc, etc..

Well if you are on the fence, jump it!

First of all, the lamp works. You set your timer and once you do that, all you have to do is put your hand it and it starts automatically. Awesome! Like a real salon. I was able to do my hands in 45 minutes. It would have been even faster but I did a test run on my thumb before doing them all at once to make sure I didn't mess anything up.

Overall, I am SO happy to have this nail curing lamp! Salon Perfect Nails!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Nail Care**: Strong preference for DIY nail care, particularly gel manicures. The user is enthusiastic about achieving salon-quality results at home.
- **First-Time User**: The user has recently started using gel polish, demonstrating a willingness to learn and engage with new beauty techniques.
- **Positive Experience with Technology**: Appreciates user-friendly technology, as indicated by a smooth operation of the UV light with automatic timer functions, enhancing the overall manicure experience.
- **Emphasis on Efficiency**: Values efficiency in application, as seen in the user’s focus on time taken to complete the manicure.
- **Encouraging for Others**: Actively recommends the product to others who might be hesitant, indicating a tendency to share positive experiences.
- **Satisfaction with Purchase**: High overall satisfaction with the nail curing lamp, contributing to a favorable view of future similar purchases.

This profile suggests a user who is open to exploring beauty tools, values ease of use, efficiency, and enjoys sharing positive experiences with others in the nail care community.
